verses.name: Genesis 43:8
verses.text: And Judah said unto Israel his father, Send the lad with me, and we will arise and go; that we may live, and not die, both we, and thou, and also our little ones.

verses.name: Genesis 43:9
verses.text: I will be surety for him; of my hand shalt thou require him: if I bring him not unto thee, and set him before thee, then let me bear the blame for ever:

verses.name: Genesis 43:10
verses.text: For except we had lingered, surely now we had returned this second time.
